title: Video: Fastest for Now – pain, suffering and Kokopelli FKT attempts
content:
Providing a desert passage between Utah’s La Sal Mountains and Loma, Colorado, the Kokopelli Trail is an iconic mountain bike route. When Kait Boyle and Kurt Refsnider kitted out for mountain bike FKT attempts on the 137-mile trail on a cold November morning, they were just two suitors among many. The COVID-19 pandemic fueled the

The post Video: Fastest for Now – pain, suffering and Kokopelli FKT attempts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
